user_question: How do I make a dragon fruit and lavender sorbet, and can you generate an image of it?
final_answer: Dragon fruit and lavender sorbet recipe: 2 cups dragon fruit puree, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup water, 1 tbsp dried lavender, 1 tbsp lemon juice. Image of dragon fruit and lavender sorbet generated. Best method to infuse lavender: Steep dried lavender in hot water for 5 minutes, then strain and use the infused water in the sorbet mixture.
